title: How to Turn Social Anxiety into Your Greatest Asset, The Benefits of Being an Introvert + Tips for Reducing Burnout & Workplace Anxiety (Interview with Morra Aarons-Mele)
description:
Register for my 2020 Virtual Mental Health Solutions Summit here:https://www.drleafconference.com  **Early bird tickets end October 15 

 -Sign up to join my free text program and receive mental health care tips and strategies, exclusive offers and more! Just text DRLEAF to 1 (833) 285 3747 (*Only available for U.S numbers at this time)   

Show Description: In this podcast (episode #205) and blog, I speak with top podcast host, author and businesswoman Morra Aarons-Mele about how to turn social anxiety into your greatest asset, the many benefits of being an introvert and how to reduce mental stress and anxiety in the workplace.   

For more info on Morra visit: https://www.wearewomenonline.com/ and https://www.womenandwork.org/ 

Listen to her podcast here: https://hbr.org/podcast/2019/09/introducing-the-anxious-achiever  

Read the show blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/how-to-turn-social-anxiety-into-your-greatest-asset-the-benefits-of-being-an-introvert-tips-for-reducing-burnout-workplace-anxiety-interview-with-morra-aarons-mele


**Special offers from our sponsors:

Podcast Highlights

4:20 How to survive working at home during the pandemic

7:35 How to manage your anxiety during COVID

11:24 How helping others helps you

39:11 Managing burnout and anxiety as a leader

47:50 How to build a career if you are an anxious introvert
